data.title: Favorite Take-Out in Parma
data.text: My husband and I always get the Sittoos Combo for take-out. It has a little of everything we like. The hummos here is the best around. We usually get the larger size with our meal and then enjoy it for the next few days with the accompanying pita bread or our own fresh veggies. The spinach pie is delicious...great to put in packed lunches. We also like the tabouli. I've dined in the casual dining room with a friend several times and we love how yummy AND reasonably priced everything is. Employees are super nice, efficient, and our meal is always ready when they say it will be. I would give six stars if I could!

data.title: Great Value
data.text: Excellent food at a very reasonable price. The rice pilaf is some of the best we have ever had. The service and value cannot be beat. Great family fare.

data.title: Excellent Food!
data.text:
If you like Lebanese food you won't be disappointed here! The food is excellent and always served fresh. The workers always friendly. 
I think they have the best, most creamy hummus around! If you like spicy try it with their hot sauce because you will love it.

data.title: Best ME in CLE
data.text: Simple Lebanese/Syrian style. Beef shawerma and chicken shishtawook very good. Get fatoosh salad with side of garlic sauce... Add homemade hot sauce to your dinners too. Excellent mujadara. Reasonable prices. Smooth and creamy hummus.

data.title: Tasty and affordable!
data.text: I've been coming here with my husband for a while now and they never disappoint! You pretty much can't go wrong with what you order. If you like a lot of meat, you may want to ask for double meat. The tabbouleh is very good. The food is prepared quickly and the workers are always pleasant!

data.title: Healthy food fast
data.text: Great Mediterranean food always fresh. Lovely eat in or carry out. Very reasonable prices. It's in Parma, where there are few good ethnic places other than Mexican and Chinese. Also in n Olmsted.

data.title: Great Salads!
data.text: We had chicken lentil soup and one of their salads (but forgot the name of it) with chicken kabob meat on it. Both were very good. Chicken was flavorful and moist.  My only complaint is the plastic cups used for the beverages! Not sure how sanitary they are!

data.title: Great spot for a casual bite
data.text: This place is great, especially for a casual bite. The staff is friendly, food delicious and it's inexpensive. I am generally a carnivore but can't pass on their vegetarian sampler - yum!!

data.title: Very good food!
data.text: I love Sittoo's food. It is delicious and they give good sized portions. I am only sad that their location in Garfield Hts has closed, but I will still travel to get their tasty chicken shawarma. The baklava is also awesome!

data.title: For the Love of Lebanese Food!
data.text:
I never knew that I would ever enjoy Middle Eastern food this much until I visited Sittoo's! My first trip was to the one in Garfield Heights, which is now closed, but this location is just as good. I love the shawarma and my wife has a fetish for the fattoush. The kids adore the chargrilled chicken tenders and rice (although I seem to find myself sneaking forkfuls when they aren't looking!). The hummus and pita here is amazing, and the baklava is terrific!

Sittoo's is not as fancy as it's a bit more "upscale" sister restaurant, Aladdin's. But it definitely offers comparable food at more reasonable prices. We dine here on the regular basis and will continue to. LOVE IT!

data.title: Try It
data.text: It's hard to get people to try new things especially things that are different. But you need to try this place everything ive ever had here is awesome.

data.title: Great lunch!
data.text: I dropped in for lunch not knowing what to expect. It was crowded so, I knew it must be good. I ordered the "business lunch combo". It was very good and I would recommend this restaurant.  Reasonably priced & a good assortment of items.

data.title: You have to try this place!
data.text: If you like Aladdin's you will love Sitto's.  If you have never had either, GO HERE!  The food is fresh, tasty and authentic lebanese food.  The tabouli is amazing.  Sometimes you get tabouli that is loaded with mint.  NOT here!  I cannot get enough of it.  The hummus is also fresh and excellent.  Smoothe and not overly oily like at some places.  The stuffed grape leaves YES get them!  Actually, everything here is amazing.  I cannot say enough about the quality of their foods.  It is a regular choice for us.  Eat in their cute little dining area or take out.  It is walk up service so you order your food at the counter and they bring it to your table.  Tea is charged per cup.  Coffee and soda unlimited refills.

data.title: Just like Grandma's !!
data.text: That's what Sitto means in English, and it's true. I am middle eastern , and this food is very close to mine. If your looking for good middle eastern food,reasonable prices,and excellent customer service,you have to check them out.
